predicted_answer: The purpose of the independent auditor's report is to provide reasonable assurance about whether the consolidated financial statements are free from material misstatement, whether due to fraud or error, and whether the condensed management report and Group management report provide an appropriate view of the Group's position and comply with legal requirements. The report also includes the auditor's opinions on the consolidated financial statements and the condensed management report and Group management report.

The legal representatives are responsible for preparing the condensed management report and Group management report, ensuring they comply with German legal requirements and present an appropriate view of the Group's position and future opportunities and risks. The Supervisory Board is responsible for overseeing the financial reporting process for the preparation of the consolidated financial statements.

The legal representatives are responsible for preparing the consolidated financial statements in compliance with German GAAP and ensuring that they provide a true and fair view of the Group's assets, financial position, and earnings. They are also responsible for implementing internal controls necessary for the preparation of the statements.

The responsibilities of the auditor include obtaining reasonable assurance about the accuracy and completeness of the consolidated financial statements, evaluating the consistency and conformity of the management reports with the financial statements and legal requirements, and providing an auditor's report that includes opinions on both the financial statements and the management reports.

predicted_answer: Liquidity risks refer to the risk of not being able to obtain enough liquidity at the expected terms when needed, such as refinancing risk.
The Supervisory Board received detailed reports from the Management Board in preparation for each meeting.
The information provided does not mention who was appointed as Chairman and Deputy Chairman of the Supervisory Board.

Baker Tilly GmbH & Co. KG Wirtschaftsprüfungsgesellschaft in Düsseldorf was appointed as the auditor for the annual financial statements and consolidated financial statements for the 2021 financial year.

The control agreement signed by msg life ag and msg systems ag signifies that msg systems ag now has control over msg life ag. This agreement allows msg life ag to benefit from the local presences of msg systems ag and generate cross-selling effects in various markets. Additionally, msg life ag's products and consulting services are now a fixed part of the msg Group's portfolio, making it a more significant strategic partner for its customers.

As of 31 December 2021, the members of the Management Board of msg life ag were Rolf Zielke (Chairman), Dr Aristid Neuburger (Deputy Chairman), Francesco Cargnel, Robert Hess, Milenko Radic, and Dr Wolf Wiedmann.
The key products and services offered by msg life AG include consulting services in product and tariff modeling, as well as operator models.
The forecast for global economic growth in 2022 is expected to be around 4.1 percent according to the World Bank and 4.4 percent according to the IMF.
The manufacturing sector and foreign trade showed improvement in 2021.

The company faces liquidity risks in relation to cash and cash equivalents, including the risk of not being able to obtain sufficient liquidity at the expected terms when required (refinancing risk). However, there are no default risks in relation to cash and cash equivalents as they are invested at banks with good ratings.
The ECB decided to reduce the rate of PEPP purchases moderately.

Some key developments in the insurance industry include the industry remaining profitable during the pandemic, the industry being described as fundamentally robust by EIOPA, and the focus on innovative products that meet the needs of both policyholders and insurers.
The USA is a global market leader in the insurance industry, accounting for over 40% of the global market.

msg life serves the US market and has been examining the possibility of deploying a localized version of its European life insurance products in connection with its specific US products. The company has experienced steady growth in various insurance sectors in the US market and has received numerous new orders in 2021, with expectations of relevant new business in the 2022 financial year.

The financial results of msg life Group in the 2021 reporting period exceeded the targets set at the beginning of the year for Group revenue from its own business and Group earnings. The net interest result of msg life ag was -0.4 million euros, and income tax expenses amounted to 0.9 million euros.

The German insurance industry reported a 1.1% increase in premiums in the 2021 financial year, reaching 223.4 billion euros. The industry's performance was considered solid despite the challenges of the Covid-19 pandemic.
The turnover of the msg life Group in the financial year was 193.8 million euros.
The turnover of the msg life Group in the 2021 financial year was not provided in the given context.

msg life takes measures such as continuous exchange of views with employees, internal training, on-the-job graduate training, recruitment through market channels, and leadership guidelines for managers to counter the risk of economic and technological factors.
The main risks identified in the text are credit risks (default risks).

The regulatory developments that have impacted the healthcare industry include the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (Obamacare) in the US and the Transparency Directive (SFDR) introduced by the European Commission.
The main types of risk that the msg life Group is exposed to include software defects in third-party software used in their own products, problems in project execution, and personnel risks.

The Qualification Suite is a powerful learning management system that allows msg life to manage and develop training courses and qualification content in one platform. It helps the company to digitize its qualification courses and streamline its training processes. Additionally, it enables msg life to avoid the need for expensive external capacities and potential quality losses in project development.

The risks that msg life faces include uncertainties in its business operations that can impact its earnings, financial position, and assets. These risks can have either positive or negative effects on the company. Additionally, the Covid-19 pandemic has not had significant effects on msg life's operating and financial performance at the time of preparing the financial statements.
The R&D expenditure of the msg life Group in the 2021 financial year was 11.195 million euros.
The total R&D expenditure for msg life Group in the 2021 financial year was 11.195 million euros.

The main factors contributing to the changes in msg life ag's turnover in the 2021 financial year were numerous sales successes with corresponding license income and stable business with existing customers. Additionally, lower travel costs due to the Covid-19 pandemic also contributed to the changes in expenses.

The net total of the line item 'Inventories' is 7.5 million euros. It has increased because payments received on account and work in progress exceeded the payments received on account of customer projects as at the reporting date.

The msg life Group is a consulting and software company that specializes in providing solutions for the insurance and retirement savings market, particularly for life insurance companies and pension fund institutions in Europe and health and group insurance companies in the United States.

The TRAIL.X project is a collaboration between msg life and the Ludwig Maximilian University of Munich to develop deep neural networks (DNNs) for the actuarial computation module. This project allows life insurers to replace old system generations, integrate artificial intelligence into their core functions, and modernize their systems. This benefits life insurers by improving efficiency, accuracy, and the ability to adapt to changing market conditions.

The German economy showed improvement in the GDP growth rate and the life insurance sector in 2021.

The German insurance industry reported a 1.1% increase in premiums in the 2021 financial year, reaching 223.4 billion euros. The industry's performance was considered solid despite the challenges of the Covid-19 pandemic.
The ECB decided to reduce the rate of PEPP purchases moderately.
Some key developments in the insurance industry include the adoption of microservice-oriented architectures, the introduction of innovative products, and the use of platforms in the industry.
The USA is a global market leader in the insurance industry, accounting for over 40% of the global market.

msg life serves the US market and has been examining the possibility of deploying a localized version of its European life insurance products in connection with its specific US products. predicted_answer: The R&D expenditure of the msg life Group in the 2021 financial year was 11.195 million euros.

The onboarding process for new employees at msg life in 2021 was primarily remote and digitized. It included welcome and introductory events where the company's strategic orientation and business targets were presented. The aim was to provide new colleagues with a broad network within the company as quickly as possible.

The Qualification Suite is a powerful learning management system that allows msg life to manage and develop training courses and qualification content in one platform. It helps the company to digitize its qualification courses and streamline its training processes. Additionally, it enables msg life to avoid the need for expensive external capacities and potential quality losses in project development.
The main types of risk that the msg life Group is exposed to include financial risk and risks associated with the use of third-party software in its own products.

The regulatory developments that have impacted the healthcare industry include the enactment of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (Obamacare) in 2013 and the improvement to the Act in late 2021 through the Build Back Better Act.
The main risks identified in the text are credit risks (default risks).

msg life takes measures such as continuous exchange of views with employees, internal training, on-the-job graduate training, and recruitment through market channels to counter the risk of economic and technological factors. They also have leadership guidelines for managers in place.
Liquidity risks refer to the risk of not being able to obtain enough liquidity at the expected terms when needed, such as the risk of not being able to refinance debt.

The contact information for msg life ag is as follows:

- Email address: info@msg-life.com
